definition: record of actual events/documentary (factual rather than fictional)

sentences.english: The film documented the development of our country during the 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影紀實性地描述了我國50年中的發展過程。

sentences.english: And so I would never write non-fiction if these things didn't occur.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我從不寫紀實性文體，如果事情沒有發生。

sentences.english: In this exhibition, Wall engages the twinned histories of documentary photography and neorealist film.
sentences.chinese: 第四幅是一個無人物的紀實攝影。

sentences.english: Its prime-time schedule is packed with reality TV and soap operas.
sentences.chinese: 他的黃金時間節目表中充滿了紀實節目和肥皂劇。

sentences.english: For generations of photojournalists working in the middle of the action, a Leica camera was that tool.
sentences.chinese: 對於幾代紀實攝影師來說，徠卡正是這樣的利器。

sentences.english: This is China"s first exploration depth of the documentary work marriage asexual."
sentences.chinese: 這是中國第一部深度探查無性婚姻的紀實作品。

sentences.english: Carries on the integrity description to the Chinese on-the-spot report style movie development course.
sentences.chinese: 對中國紀實風格電影的發展歷程進行整體性描述。

sentences.english: This is a documentary of the basic problems of conflict analysis and comb.
sentences.chinese: 這是對紀實性衝突基本問題的分析和梳理。

sentences.english: She met Zeke suave romantic and sexual impotence documentary writer Jack.
sentences.chinese: 她結識了風流倜儻的齊克和性無能的紀實作家傑克。

sentences.english: Finally, the paper will summarize the present situation of Chinese on-the-spot report style movie and will forecast its future.
sentences.chinese: 最後概括中國紀實風格電影的現狀並展望其未來。

sentences.english: They always used to make beautified histories, and they're also afraid that it won't sell.
sentences.chinese: 因爲以前都是出風光紀實，又怕賣不掉。

sentences.english: Travelogues, even those characterized by geographical facts and realistic descriptions, are often read as allegories.
sentences.chinese: 最紀實的遊記也往往被讀爲寓言。

sentences.english: Most bestselling nonfiction authors are men.
sentences.chinese: 許多暢銷紀實小說的作者是男性。

sentences.english: In addition, "the reallife fiction" of Liu Xinwu has also had the widespread influence.
sentences.chinese: 此外，劉心武的“紀實小說”也產生了廣泛影響。

sentences.english: Chapter I : Summary on Wushan Yangko.
sentences.chinese: 第二章爲武山秧歌活動紀實。

sentences.english: The city and technology, documentary and street life are among subjects he tackles.
sentences.chinese: 城市與技術，紀實和街道生活都是他涉及的方面。

definition: specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
to design/to plot/to plan out/to compose/to draw a mental sketch/conception/plan/idea/composition
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
guide (e.g. book or other printed material)
arteries and veins/network of blood vessels/vascular system (of a plant or animal)/(fig.) fabric (i.e. underlying structure, as in "social fabric")/overall context
to see through/perspective/to examine by fluoroscopy (i.e. X-ray)
